name: BeamNG Vehicle Definition Format
summary: A JBEAM file contains information in the JBeam format that defines soft-body vehicles appearing in games employing the BeamNG engine. It stores plain text information, such as nodes and beams, representing the appearance and behavior of a vehicle or a vehicle part (e.g., a hood, fender, wheel, etc.). JBeam is based on the JSON format, which you can create, open, and edit with source code or text editors.
